definition: to visit/to call on/to seek/to inquire/to investigate

sentences.english: A few years later I was exploring the ruins of a hilltop temple in Cambodia.
sentences.chinese: 幾年後，我尋訪了柬埔寨一座山頂寺廟的遺址。

sentences.english: In return for David, and discussions with President sun his recovery plan.
sentences.chinese: 國大偉尋訪歸來，和孫院長一起研討自己的復甦計劃。

sentences.english: He sent them to Bethlehem and said, "Go and make a careful search for the child.
sentences.chinese: 就差他們往伯利恆去，說，你們去仔細尋訪那小孩子。

sentences.english: With an aching heart, he had revisited his beloved haunts.
sentences.chinese: 懷着哀痛的心情，他重新尋訪了他所心愛的舊遊地。

sentences.english: Let's take a trip to the mysterious Kanas Lake.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們去尋訪神祕的喀納斯湖吧。

sentences.english: I will wear an iron mask, and only when armed and mailed shall I seek them.
sentences.chinese: 我要戴上鐵鑄的面具，披甲戴盔後尋訪他們。

definition: to pay a visit/to call on
to have a taste of/to realize/to appreciate
to carry/to take along/to bring along/to hold (hands)/also pr. [xi1]
to pass over mountains ridges (idiom); fig. hardships of the journey
to thumb through/to flip through (a book)
to amuse oneself/to have fun/to go sightseeing/to take a stroll
to assemble/to concentrate/to mass/to build up/to marshal
